Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.view.commongoal

Class DiagonalEqualPatternGoalView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.view.CommonGoalView
it.polimi.ingsw.model.view.commongoal.DiagonalEqualPatternGoalView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DiagonalEqualPatternGoalView extends CommonGoalView
This class represents the View of the DiagonalEqualPattern. It contains the necessary components for displaying the pattern and referencing it. This can be done through a method to identify the response to a given situation regarding this goal pattern achievement (toString). It also provides a method to directly access the class pattern which is linked to other usages in different classes.
See Also:
